box_jump.name: Box Jump
box_jump.instruction: Explode up, land soft, step down. Reset between reps. 8-10 reps.

skater_hops.name: Skater Hops
skater_hops.instruction: Lateral explosive jumps. Hold landing 1s. Alternate sides continuously, 10 per side.

nordic_drop.name: Nordic Hamstring Drop
nordic_drop.instruction: Lower torso slowly to floor using hamstrings. 6-8 reps.

russian_twist.name: Weighted Russian Twist
russian_twist.instruction: Rotate shoulders side to side. Each touch = 1 rep. 20 total reps (10 per side).

lateral_hops.name: Lateral Hops
lateral_hops.instruction: Quick side-to-side hops, soft landing. Stay on same spot. 20 total hops.

drop_jump.name: Drop Jump Hold
drop_jump.instruction: Step off low box, land in squat, hold 2s. Focus on quiet landing. 8 reps.

jump_squat.name: Jump Squat
jump_squat.instruction: Squat down, explode up, land soft into next squat. 10-12 reps.

lateral_box_jump.name: Lateral Box Jump
lateral_box_jump.instruction: Jump sideways onto box, step down, repeat other side. Alternate, 5 per side.

quick_feet_turns.name: Quick Feet Turn Drill
quick_feet_turns.instruction: Fast feet in place, pivot 180Â° every 3s. Continue for full duration.
